text: NEW DELHI, July 12 Indias Reliance Industries on Sunday said Qualcomm Incs investment arm will buy a 0.15% stake in its digital unit Jio Platforms for 7.3 billion Indian rupees ($97.1 million).The partnership will help Jio Platforms, the unit that houses Reliances telecoms venture Jio Infocomm, to rollout advanced 5G infrastructure and services for Indian customers, Reliance said in a statement.
